dataList.dlg: Commencing train cleanup mission. Let's bring those passengers back to their seats.
I prefer to keep an empty stomach in the morning. I can get used to the sight of our passengers, but the smell... The smell is quite difficult to acclimate to.

For lunch, I usually eat the premium boxed lunch sold at each WARP train station platform.
From what I hear, the boxed lunch sold at the station located in the headquarters is the best of them all. I suggest that you seek it out if you ever have the chance.

Don't mind me, Executive Manager. You may return to your quarters.
Once again, my shift extends to the last train of the day... I mean, the first train of tomorrow. I'll be here for a while...
I suppose the ticket price cuts and economy car ticket expansion caused by certain... unfortunate events are to blame for multiplying our workload by several magnitudes.

Now observe. If the passengers have barricaded themselves inside the car, then... rip the space to tear open the door before entering. A word of warning, however: do that only after the train has come to a complete stop.

Our mission is to properly recognize and match the correct genomes, put the parts back together, and bring the passengers back to their seats.
Passenger neutralization is not our primary objective; it's just a part of the process.

Some Cleanup Agents believe that they are unfit for this line of work, but... a leader should know how to make use of unmotivated subordinates as well.
There may come a moment in which they show their usefulness, as they usually don't hold certain unnecessary ideations.

Please, don't let the sights of the train disturb you. I am quite certain that this is business as usual for most Wings.
If you find it difficult to stomach the sight, then I suggest coming back later. Because you'll be seeing these chunks of meat throughout the entire cleanup process.
... I can't seem to return. No matter how many trains I board day after day.
The homeward journey is...! Agh... it's still tumultuous.
All Cleanup personnel to positions. Your shift's about to begin.
Dimensional Ripple Gauntlets charged and at the ready.
Please wait until this train is cleaned up. Then I'll answer your questions.
Testing gear charges. Let's clean them up in one fell swoop.
Passenger neutralization confirmed.
Hup...
Neutralization complete. Passenger reconstruction procedure, ready to commence.
So this is how I... in this wandering path with no end in sight...
I made sure that everyone on the team read the manual to the letter. This is but an expected result.
... The manual needs an update.
Cleanup complete. Now, since we're with the passengers, pretend what you saw didn't happen. Not a word of anything you saw or heard.
We wrapped that up much earlier than expected. Rest up while we wait for the next train. I'll deal with the report in the meantime.
... Cleanup failed. Gear charge at... zero. I can't... go back...
